com.github.triceo.splitlog.api

Interface MessageFormatter


  • public interface MessageFormatter
    Converts a message to a textual representation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String LINE_SEPARATOR
      Platform-specific line separator.

    • Method Summary

      String format(Message m, File source)
      Provides a textual representation of a message.

        Platform-specific line separator.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        String format(Message m,
            File source)
        Provides a textual representation of a message.
        Parameters:
        m - Message in question.
        source - The file that was being tailed to receive this message.
        Returns:
        Message as a string.
